title: Ranked boarder
body: I currently have the new boarder but its silver boarder when I'm in plat 2, Do you get the new one later and stick to your old one or has something happened??

replies.body:
The border you are currently seeing is your rank from 2014 season, it just looks different because of the new border design that was added with the patch today.

Your 2015 season rewards, including your current ranked border, will be distributed sometime between now and the 17th of November.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IuAL9EaZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-11T00:08:10.821+0000)
>
> The border you are currently seeing is your rank from 2014 season, it just looks different because of the new border design that was added with the patch today.
> 
> Your 2015 season rewards, including your current ranked border, will be distributed sometime between now and the 17th of November.

Ok thank you
Rewards haven't been given out yet.
